last_episode_to_air.name: Mine Alone
last_episode_to_air.overview: Snap creates a new security system for the Magic Chalk Mine.

name: ChalkZone
overview: When anything is erased from a chalkboard, it’s not really gone – it just enters a realm called the Chalkzone. And fifth grader Rudy Tabootie found a way to go there! With a piece of “White Lightning” chalk, he can enter the Chalkzone any time he likes. In the Chalkzone, Rudy befriends Snap, a bold superhero Rudy drew years ago. But Rudy soon discovers not every doodle is friendly.

episodes.name: Rudy's First Adventure
episodes.overview: While in detention, Rudy finds out about the magic chalk and he goes to Chalk Zone, a place where all the erased chalk pictures go to. He meets up with Snap, a picture of a superhero that Rudy drew in 2nd grade, and also this this monster that wants to hurt everyone. With Snap's help, Rudy is able to beat the thick headed monster.

episodes.name: Rudy's Story
episodes.overview: Everyone comes back from Vacation and has to read their writing piece to the class. Rudy drew a comic book of his Chalkzone Adventures in Chalkzone. Rudy has to stay back after class and write a real story of his Vacation. Rudy then explains his story to the new girl, Penny!

episodes.name: Snapmobile
episodes.overview: Snap wants to go to the car show to see Queen Rapsheeba, only he doesn't have a car. That all changes when he gets a voice activated car that takes all of his commands (and figures of speech) literally.

episodes.name: Rudy's Date
episodes.overview: Rudy brings his friend Penny to ChalkZone to help her find a formula, but Snap sees Penny as Rudy's girlfriend.

episodes.name: Future Zone
episodes.overview: Penny and Rudy have to do a report on future inventions where they go into chalkzone. Then a robot, Craniac 3, sees Rudy drawing with the chalk, it tries to use the chalk, but fails (only humans can use the chalk). It takes rudy into the dome of the future, with all these useless and stupid inventions.

episodes.name: The Wiggies
episodes.overview: Hair eating frogs from Chalk Zone have invaded PlainsVille. Can Rudy and Penny send them back and save the hair of PlainsVille?

episodes.name: Rapunzel
episodes.overview: Snap takes Penny and Rudy to see Chalk Zone's biggets singing sensation Rapsheba. But, a thundercloud ruins the concert.

episodes.name: Hair To Stay
episodes.overview: A walking mustache gives Snap problens through out the course of his day.

episodes.name: French Fry Falls
episodes.overview: Rudy, Snap and Penny are floating down a river when Rudy meets a firmiliar drawing. He meets his past drawing of Biclops and he has a bone to pick with Rudy.

episodes.name: Gift Adrift
episodes.overview: Rudy leaves the vacum for his dad's birthday with Snap in Chalkzone, but Snap accidently turns it on and the ...

episodes.name: Snap Out of Water
episodes.overview: Rudy and Snap find a new island in Chalkzone and go have a barbacue and Snap was chased out of Chalkzone. Penny covers by saying that Snap was Rudy's replacement in a foreign exchange program. Meanwhie, Rudy is escapeing the rough waters of Chalkzone. Snap and Rudy cahnge places and everything gets to normal as normal as things get.

episodes.name: Two Left Feet
episodes.overview: Snap watches Rapsheba perform in the begining ofepisode. Everyone begins to dance to the Square Dance. Two giant feet ruin things for everyone. Snap gets 2 giant boots to teach the 2 feet a lesson.

episodes.name: Rudus Tabootus
episodes.overview: Rudy goes in a trip to the coleceium. But all his parents want to do is eat. Rudy goes to check it out himself and finds ancient chalk drawings and draws a chalk portal and goes to the past Chalkzone hwere he is up against a really tough lion. Snap gives Rudy the idea to be a liontamer and the lion turns into a harmless kitty. The emperor met with Rudy to concradulate him. Then Rudy gets chalenged by a farting guy for a chariot race. Odiferus seems he

episodes.name: The Skwarl
episodes.overview: Skwarl, a drawing that Rudy began to draw, was un-happy about his looks and he went to get his vengence.

episodes.name: Pie Day
episodes.overview: Snap wishes to save Pie Day from the angry people that say that dessert is not before lunch. But what really is happening is people throw pies at eachother. Not eat them!

episodes.name: Secret Passages
episodes.overview: Rudy and Penny use Chalkzone as a way to get back to their school to recover a hamster.

episodes.name: Hole In The Wall
episodes.overview: Rudy and Penny visit Rudy's dad's old school from when he was little. Rudy's Dad said he wrote a letter to Mildred about how good she was on reading some kind of poetry. Ever since then, Rudy's Dad 'Chickend out' about giving the letter to Mildred. He hid it under a very rickety board on the floor. Rudy and Penny enter from ChalkZone into the school, to try and not tresspass.   When Rudy and Penny get caught, Vinnie, the brother to the construction worker, steps into the old school and finds out about the portal to ChalkZone. Now Vinnie wants to turn ChalkZone into an Ammusement Park!

episodes.name: The Terrible 2 1/2's
episodes.overview: Rudy and Penny volunteer to baby-sit Rudy's little cousin Sophie,'Soph'. When Sophie draws a ChalkZone portal, she fall's in and starts to explore the land of ChalkZone while Rudy and Snap come up of ideas to get Sophie back to Rudy's house safely. Meanwhile, Penny comes up with elaborate scheme to make sure Rudy's mom and Sophie's mom don't find out about Rudy and Sophie being in ChalkZone.

episodes.name: Superhero Snap
episodes.overview: Snap loves a certain Superhero and wishes to be just like him, although Snap doesn't have the same Superhero powers as him, he has one power that can defeat a certain villain that the Superhero can't.

episodes.name: Disappearing Act
episodes.overview: Reggie performs magic and thinks he turned Rudy into an eraser.

episodes.name: Portable Portal
episodes.overview: Ms. Tweezer, a teacher from a company that tries to prevent imagination in kids' art, comes to Rudy's school. Rudy uses his Portable Portal to let his friends come out and teach her a lesson.

episodes.name: Snap On Tour
episodes.overview: Snap takes friends of chalkzone on a tour for those who have been erased.

episodes.name: Waste Mountain
episodes.overview: Rudy accidentally drops garbage bags (containing cheeseburger smoothies) into ChalkZone, which eat through the Magic Chalk Mine.

episodes.name: MadCap Snap
episodes.overview: Rudy's new comic series makes kids draw "Snips", different versions of Snap. These little creatures cause havoc all through Chalkzone. Which causes the citizens to think Snap is causing all the chaos, making everyone hate him

episodes.name: What's My Line
episodes.overview: Snap and Blocky have fun using only a chalk line.

episodes.name: Pop Goes The Balloon
episodes.overview: After an argument with his parents, Rudy goes into Chalkzone to find a teenage drawing of his parents in a heart-shaped bubble singing a song. He accidentally pops the bubble and he must get it in the air again before his parents are mad at each other for ever.

episodes.name: Snap Builds His Dream house
episodes.overview: Snap asks Rudy to build him a house on the beach. But soon, it gets in the way of the other people on the beach. Snap welcomes them to make their own suggestions about the house. However, the workstarts to annoy Rudy so he sends the whole house out to sea.

episodes.name: FirePlug Ballet
episodes.overview: Snap goes to a musical about fire hydrants. There

episodes.name: The Heist
episodes.overview: Rudy tries to stop the plans of a powerful wrestler to rob a bank by drawing an even bigger chalk version of the wrestler to take on the heister.

episodes.name: Battle of The Hands
episodes.overview: Rudy enters the Magic Chalk Mine to find the red chalk. This is no ordinary chalk, it draws only evil drawings whenever it wants. Rudy must battle bad chalk with white chalk, and get it out of Chalkzone before Cyclops notices what happened.

episodes.name: Chocolate Brunch
episodes.overview: Snap wants to eat Chocolate bunnies but Blocky won't let him.

episodes.name: The Smooch
episodes.overview: While working on their book of ChalkZone; Flora, Fauna, Rudy, Penny and Snap venture to Hahama Island to learn more about a mysterious bird called The Smooch. Once on the island, they meet the Haha Men who show them around by singing. But when they're each kissed by the Smooch Bird and are unable to stop laughing until they kiss someone else.

episodes.name: Power Play
episodes.overview: Rudy fakes a science project by drawing a Bobble-Head Snap Machine in ChalkZone. His hastily drawn machine earns him the just-barely-passing grade he wanted. But then Dr. Von Dockter, the egocentric scientist who's always right, discovers that Rudy's machine has no electrical power source. He concludes that Rudy Tabootie has discovered the secret of perpetual energy. Penny is furious at Rudy, because she worked really hard on her project while Rudy drew up his project in 5 seconds and it is more popular than hers. But when Rudy's Bobble-head Snap machine is taken away for scientific research, risking the exposure of ChalkZone, Penny overcomes her anger towards Rudy and she uses the chalk herself for her first solo venture into ChalkZone to help Rudy.

episodes.name: Pumpkin Love
episodes.overview: Rudy hides his pumpkin in Chalkzone to keep Reggie from vandalizing it before his school's pumpkin decorating contest. Unfortunately, the pumpkin gets into the wrong hands in Chalkzone, and Rudy must get his stolen Jill-O-Lantern back in time for the contest.

episodes.name: Snap's Nightmare (Chip Of Fools)
episodes.overview: Snap eats a cookie from the ChalkLet Chip Cookie Tree. However, he soon finds out that eating a cookie from this tree causes cookie nightmares to take over his peaceful sleep.

episodes.name: Irresistable
episodes.overview: Snap wears a new cologne to impress Queen Rapshiba. But to his dismay, she has a stuffy nose, and Snap is being chased by Chalkzone creatures who can't resist the scent.

episodes.name: Chalk Queen
episodes.overview: Penny is working on her Biology report and asks Rudy to do some illustrations for her. When he fails to do them for her and leaves to save ChalkZone, Skrawl returns to ChalkZone to give her a chance for revenge

episodes.name: Cleo's Secret
episodes.overview: While on a school field trip to the art museum, Rudy and Penny take a trip to ChalkZone to uncover the secrets of Cleopatra and win the Archaeology Gee-Wiz Award

episodes.name: Snap's Wishy Washout
episodes.overview: Snap catches a shooting star and gets 3 wishes.

episodes.name: Draw and Let Draw
episodes.overview: Draw and Let Draw Rudy thinks he knows what he's doing when he "fixes" other kids' sidewalk drawings that seem dangerous. However, when he arrives in Chalkzone he learns that these drawings weren't harmful at all. Then, all the cartoons that he messed with become upset at him for changing them from their original forms.

episodes.name: The Towering Wilter
episodes.overview: When the entire class gets F's on their tests, they complain that Mr. Wilter told them to study Chapter 11, not Chapter 12. Rudy then tells Mr. Wilter that he can prove that Wilter wrote Ch. 11 on the board before recess is over or there would be no recess for a week for the students. In Chalkzone, he finds out that a trash can named Push has the Chapter 11 note from the board. Push is building a tower of all the assignments Mr. Wilter gives. Rudy has to try to convince Push to let Rudy take a picture of it to show Mr. Wilter.

episodes.name: Snapsheebah
episodes.overview: When snap tries to get tickets to one of Rapsheeba's musical plays, they are sold out. He sneaks in with the cost

episodes.name: Taffy
episodes.overview: Taffy Rudy, Penny, and Snap save Chalkzone from being taken over by a taffy glacier. Their efforts backfire when the taffy glacier comes alive and tries to consume the people of Chalkzone.

episodes.name: Follow the Bouncing Bag
episodes.overview: When Rudy and Penny go to Chslkzone in a park sidewalk, Rudy leaves his backpack under a bench. That backpack has the mini chalkboard with the portal to and from Chalkzone in it. But when Vinnie drives by and sees Rudy at the sidewalk, he wants to get his revenge and proof of Chalkzone. When he can't find out where Rudy went, he tries to pry open the backpack to figure out how to get into Chalkzone and find Rudy. When Rudy finds out what Vinnie is up to, he pulls the portal across Chalkzone and Vinnie chases the backpack with the portal in it across Plainsville.

episodes.name: Nighty Note
episodes.overview: Nighty Note Snap, who is trying to get some sleep, is disturbed by a loud group of musical notes next door. He tries to get them to play peacefully with the help of their leader, G Clef. This doesn't end up working out

episodes.name: Lost In Chalk
episodes.overview: Lost in Chalk Rudy's dad, Joe goes to a meat style convention, while in Chalkzone it is Snap's birthday. Rudy and Penny want to get to Snap's party before it is his dad's turn to style his meat. When he and Penny find out their trail to the party has been deystroyed, they must find Snap's party before all of Snap's guests leaveand it's Joe's turn to style his sausages.

episodes.name: Asleep at the Chalk
episodes.overview: Asleep at the Chalk Rudy is tired of not being able to stay up late, so he decides to go into Nightzone and stay up as long as he wants. However, he soon finds out how hard it is to stay awake and have fun. And when a firework display goes awry, it's up to a very tired Rudy to save everyone.

episodes.name: If You Can't Beat 'Em, Eat Em
episodes.overview: Snap becomes annoyed at a talking, rhyming hamburger he meets who is begging to be digested. As he tries to escape it, he runs across a cooked chicken and angry vegetables who also want to be eaten. Just as they are about to attack Snap, the hamburger saves him. Snap finally realizes that there is only

episodes.name: Water, Water Everywhere
episodes.overview: During a drought in Plainsville, Penny and Rudy try to find refuge in Chalkzone. They try to enter in an old quarry, which happens to be in the bottom of the Wait 'n Sea   in Chalkzone. Chalk water starts filling up in the quarry, and Rudy and Penny go to the rainmaker to bring rain and wash the chalk water away. In the meantime, several adults who are splashed by water magically obtain the minds of children and playfully swim in the rising chalk water.

episodes.name: RV Having Fun Yet?
episodes.overview: RV Having Fun Yet? On his way to board a vacation cruise ship, a car salesman tricks Snap to trading a very annoying, singing RV for his cruise ship ticket. The RV takes Snap to different places around Chalkzone, singing the entire way. Snap's vacation would be ruined if he can't get rid of the singing RV.

episodes.name: The Doofi
episodes.overview: In an attemp to make fun of Rudy and Penny, Reggie Bullnerd draws doofus versions, of them on the Chalkboard. An enraged Mr. Wilter unknowingly erases them into Chalkzone. Rudy and Penny have to go in.

episodes.name: That Thing You Drew
episodes.overview: Rudy asks his favorite cartoonist, Drew Yerface, to come to his school assembly after his vacation in the mountains. Drew is convinced to go to Rudy's school. Rudy soon discover's from Drew's cartoons in Chalkzone that he is stranded in the mountains and Rudy must save him in time for the assembly.

episodes.name: That Sinking Feeling
episodes.overview: Reggie steals Rudy's last piece of magic chalk and stomps it into the ground. This causes a small portal of Chalkzone to appear in the ground. Reggie's foot gets stuck in the hole he made. Snap realizes this is Reggie's foot and wants to get revenge for what Reggie tried to do to him when he was in Plainsville. Rudy tries to get Snap to leave Reggie's foot alone. But because he has no more magic chalk, he must try to erase a message into Chalkzone to Snap before  the Chalkzone is discovered.

episodes.name: Insect Aside
episodes.overview: Insect Aside Snap and Rapsheba shrink down to an insect's size with the help of a witch's spell. They then go to a show where an insect sings about his life.

episodes.name: Let's Twister Again
episodes.overview: Someone just won't stop drawing and erasing these terrible twisters! Rudy Penny and Snap find the culprit and it'sa little boy named Sonny! Penny sneaks into the boy's classroom and poses as a teacher to try to get the child to stop drawing destructive storms. Meanwhile Rudy and Snap stay in ChalkZone and battle rain, snow, sleet, hail. Rudy creates a living Chalk Fairy Tale in order to amuse an evil king and save Snap's life. Everyone lives happily ever after. A segment of Snapshots-Snap's documentary news show-takes Snap to a secret training camp for Skrawl's henchmen, the Beanie Boys.

episodes.name: Legend of the Golden Worms
episodes.overview: Rudy creates a living Chalk Fairy Tale in order to amuse an evil king and save Snap's life. Everyone lives happily ever after.

episodes.name: Beanie Boys to Men
episodes.overview: A segment of Snapshots-Snap's documentary news show-takes Snap to a secret training camp for Skrawl's henchmen, the Beanie Boys.

episodes.name: Mother Tongue
episodes.overview: Penny is going to the national speech championships, and she's totally stressed out! So Rudy and Snap take her to the newest NightZone act, called ""Mother Tongue"". In this act, a clever, comedic female zoner called Mother Tongue licks the people in the audience. Once they're licked, they speak nothing but jibberish! When licked, Penny goes into panic and runs back home. But she forgot to get an antidote lick back from Mother Tongue! Now Rudy and Snap must get Mother Tongue back to Penny to give her the antidote before her speech in the competition turns to jibberish!

episodes.name: Going Eyeballistic
episodes.overview: Going Eyeballistic Once again, Rudy tells the story of some of his adventures in ChalkZone to Penny through a comic book. In his story, Rudy and Snap are hiking in the giggling hills, when the giggling hills get the hiccups and launch Rudy and Snap right into a patch of fertile Eyeball Bushes. What happens when Eyeball Bushes are fertile? They find a new place to spawn and grow more bushes. How do they get to

episodes.name: The Ballad Of Toe Fu
episodes.overview: Around the campfire Snap sings of legendary pacifist character Toe Fu

episodes.name: Indecent Exposure
episodes.overview: Terry Beauffont tries to get a better reporting job, so she does a documentary on the fabled 'world of chalk', using Mr Wilter and Vinnie Raton as her witnesses... But the network presidents thought it was crazy, and ask why she didn't interview Snap. So Terry kidnaps Snap and brings him to the studio, and Rudy tries to foil the newscaster's intentions before CZ is revealed.

episodes.name: My Big Fat Chalk Wedding
episodes.overview: My Big Fat Chalk Wedding Rudy fixes a little girl's project... and she instantaneously develops a crush on him. On the chalkboard at school, she draws herself and her entire family at she and Rudy's wedding, but the teacher halts her efforts before she finishes Rudy. The chalk-drawn Shwatt family follow the REAL Rudy around in ChalkZone, trying to get him to marry Bobby Sue Shwatt (the chalk rendition of the girl with the crush on him)... but in the end, she decides to cancel the wedding after a bunch of other Zoners claim that Rudy proposed to them.

episodes.name: Rap-A-Present
episodes.overview: Snap tries to find a present to give to Queen Rapsheeba, but it's not easy when the flowers, chocolates and cards in ChalkZone are alive and have quirks of their own

episodes.name: Skrawl's Brain
episodes.overview: Skrawl aims to hypnotize everyone in ChalkZone with a giant brain. But the brain turns against him and hypnotizes everyone in ChalkZone into thinking they're chickens.

episodes.name: Big Loo
episodes.overview: Rudy, Penny and Snap discover a grove of toilet trees and Snap is accidentally flushed into the ChalkZone sewers. Now Rudy has to save Snap from getting swallowed by a giant, living toilet who's only pleasure is the music of the groves above.

episodes.name: Duck Snap Duck
episodes.overview: Snap helps reunite a foot and its owner for the Duck'lympics athletic competition.

episodes.name: Double Trouble
episodes.overview: Skrawl has teamed up with Craniac 4 to try and destroy Rudy and the Magic Chalk Mine once and for all.

episodes.name: The Big Blow Up Part 1
episodes.overview: Rudy releases an ancient ChalkZone disease that makes anyone made out of chalk blow up within hour's infection.

episodes.name: The Big Blow Up Part 2
episodes.overview: Rudy releases an ancient ChalkZone disease that makes anyone made out of chalk blow up within hour's infection.

episodes.name: The Smudges
episodes.overview: Queen Rapsheeba's house is haunted by a pair of Smudges: the ghosts of chalk beings that aren't completely erased into Chalkzone.

episodes.name: Tiny Pirate Problem
episodes.overview: Tiny pirates raid the ship Rudy, Penny, and Snap are on.

episodes.name: Curse of the Werefrog
episodes.overview: An enchanted frog bites Snap, causing him to turn into a were-frog whenever there is a full moon in Nightzone.

episodes.name: Howdy Rudy
episodes.overview: Rudy creates a living chalk puppet for the school talent show.

episodes.name: Attack of the Rudisaurus
episodes.overview: Rudy hides inside a chalk dinosaur to sneak into a theme park.

episodes.name: The Really Big Talent Search
episodes.overview: Snap searches for a giant to star in his movie.

episodes.name: Purple Haze
episodes.overview: Comic Book Artist creates a Haze that will destroy anything that gets erased into ChalkZone

episodes.name: No Place Like Home
episodes.overview: All of ChalkZone is abducted by aliens and Rudy & Penny must save them

episodes.name: Disaster Park
episodes.overview: Blocky and Snap's pet moustache get trapped in a dangerous theme park.

episodes.name: Do the Twitch
episodes.overview: Rudy uses a machine called the Twitch'o'Matic to make him the ultimate dancer

episodes.name: Day of the Living Mall
episodes.overview: Penny demands an explanation from Rudy on why he stopped the Super Mega Mall Project

episodes.name: Bulky Blocky
episodes.overview: Snap gets Blocky into shape to teach a bully a lesson.

episodes.name: School of Destruction
episodes.overview: Rudy gets grounded for bad grades because of spending too much time with his chalk drawing...on the day of his favorite glam metal band's concert and Rudy realizes that he is going to miss the concert, so he decides to sneak out by traveling through ChalkZone in order to get to the concert on time so he can meet up with Penny

episodes.name: Family Von Snap
episodes.overview: Snap learns about his family background

episodes.name: Knight Plight
episodes.overview: Three knights require Snap's help to retrieve their Holy Grail.

episodes.name: Disarmed Rudy
episodes.overview: Rudy breaks his arm and on that same day Jacko wants him to draw a bride

episodes.name: Poison Pen Letter
episodes.overview: Rudy writes a Poison Pen Letter to a girl from school when she doesn't invite him to her party

episodes.name: The Label Police
episodes.overview: Snap goes to jail for tearing off a pillow tag, so he, along with a lot of other imprisoned zoners, manage to escape.

episodes.name: The Crush
episodes.overview: Rudy gets his first crush on Rapsheeba's Creator, an African-American teenage girl named Trina

episodes.name: Gift of Good Intentions
episodes.overview: Rudy draws the a box that will give anyone the perfect gift

episodes.name: Snapshots 2: Wild ChalkZone!
episodes.overview: Snap's TV Show looks into the Flora & Fauna of ChalkZone.

episodes.name: The Quicksand Man
episodes.overview: Rudy, Penny, and Snap must stop a new nightmare chalkmonster before everyone lives out their own worst nightmare

episodes.name: Vampire Cannibals of New York
episodes.overview: Rudy's comic book characters gets out of control in Chalk New York

episodes.name: Killer Breath
episodes.overview: Snap must detain the Doofi's latest mess-up.

episodes.name: Reggie the Red
episodes.overview: Reggie discovers ChalkZone .... and the Red Chalk!

episodes.name: Vincent Van NoGo
episodes.overview: Rudy, Penny, and Snap meet a Vincent Van Gogh Chalk Masterpiece in need of an attitude adjustment

episodes.name: The Further Adventures of Super Hero Snap
episodes.overview: Snap returns to a life of a superhero with Blocky as his sidekick.

episodes.name: Mellow Drama Falls
episodes.overview: The ChalkZone gang enter the silent movie era of ChalkZone

episodes.name: Journey to the Center of the Yeti
episodes.overview: Snapshots takes a closer look at the Yada Yada Yeti

episodes.name: The White Board
episodes.overview: Doofus Penny takes Snap on a tour through her new Exhibition.

episodes.name: Brainy Bitsy
episodes.overview: An ChalkChimp gets to full of herself when she interferes with Penny's Mum Experiment

episodes.name: Teacher's Lounge
episodes.overview: Rudy must prove his innocence for a crime he did not commit
Snap and Rapsheeba go on a Top Secret Mission.

episodes.name: Snap vs. BooRat
episodes.overview: Snap must save Rudy and Penny from a creature who is determined to expose ChalkZone to the real world

episodes.name: Calling Dr. Memory
episodes.overview: Snap takes a trip down Memory Lane .... Literally!

episodes.name: Snapsody in Blue
episodes.overview: Planet Snap plunges into a deep blue by the cause of a new BLUE sun.

episodes.name: The Day ChalkZone Stood Still
episodes.overview: ChalkZone time stops and Rudy, Penny, Snap must solve the mystery before it's too late

episodes.name: BullSnap
episodes.overview: Snap swaps Mind with a bull and Rudy and Penny must switch him back

episodes.name: Mine Alone
episodes.overview: Snap creates a new security system for the Magic Chalk Mine.
